text: I hinde, dhikkarigala virud'dha tamage vijaya nidabekendu prarthisuttidda ade mandi â€“ idiga, allahana kadeyinda, igagale tam'ma bali iruva granthagalannu samarthisuva granthavu tam'ma balige bandiruvaga mattu tamage paricayaviruva satya granthavu tam'ma balige bandiruvaga, adannu dhikkarisuttiddare. Dhikkarigala mele allahana sapavide
